title: Who Invented Words?
description: On But Why we let you ask the questions and we help find the answers. One of the things that many of you are curious about is language. How we speak, why we speak and what we speak.
itunes:subtitle: On But Why we let you ask the questions and we help find the answers. One of the things that many of you are curious about is language. How we speak, why we speak and what we speak.
author: questions@butwhykids.org (Vermont Public)
